reviews.review: Semplicemente è un gioco fantastico. Questo secondo capitolo l'ho preferito rispetto al primo perchè a mio parere scorre meglio durante la campagna e sembrerà di finirla fin troppo velocemente, mentre nel primo ho trovato alcune parti in cui è molto facile perdersi e rimanere bloccati. Ovviamente non c'è bisogno di altre presentazioni se non per consigliarlo a chi non lo ha mai provato.
Why can I not play it
ТОП игра, есть офигеннейший сожет, кооп, потянет даже на 3 гб оперативы
Игра очень классная, заставляет поломать голову.
интересная игра но если играешь в кооп лучше выбирать друзей.
humour, énigme, difficulté bien dosée, il y a rien à dire, à part : à quand le 3ème ? :D
jogo muito divertido e de otima qualidade
Одна из лучших сюжетных игр если не лучшая.
Big brain multiplayer. Will make you think and you will increase your IQ after playing this
我玩过最好的FPS，没有之一，等G胖数三
Слева горы, справа горы, а вдали Кавказ
游戏很好，可是我脑子不好使
The multiplayer brought me back many times!

amazing game. much more story oriented than the first one which is a good thing. also has a co-op mode and custom levels (can be co-op too) which is awesome. soundtrack is great too. just an awesome game really
how are you, im a potato
Un tremendo juegazo. No podes tener Steam en tu PC y no tener esto en tu Librería. Must play sin dudas.
el mejor juego lo recomiendo :-) 100% (buena historia y buenos graficos)
We all know you've never played portal 1, but it's ok because it's more interesting, and there's multiplayer a game of trust and betrayal
This game is so fun! i like the graphics! and this game relieved my fever!
Portal 2 is a good game, I total played it with my friends, I played it for 33 hours. And its really fun, You can even make your own level.
It's really good and I liked it a lot
A great way to evaluate a potential future marriage partner!

Portal 1 was already a hit. But Portal 2 was even better. New puzzles, new elements, better graphics, great soundtrack, amazing single player campaign and good multiplayer levels that you can play in coop with a friend.

I absolutely recommend the Portal games to all gamers.
mejor que el primero y hermosa banda sonora
Because of this game Valve is my favorite gaming company now. I love this game so much.

Halfway through the game and loving it, funny from the offset, this is a continuation of the first Portal so go play that before to get all the references  (however you'll love it even if you haven't). I highly recommend this game

This game will make you think outside the box, tease your brain, make you laugh, and intrigue you with a beautiful story. It's hands-down one of the best games I've ever played, and is worth every penny.
Se jeu est un must du jeux vidéos, que se soit les levels tous bien pensées, l'histoire et l'humour qui marche très bien.Bref, un jeu à posséder absolument.

пострелял по стенам, ничего не понял и удалил игру.
This is the best puzzle game out there. Super fun and the NPC's are hilarious and entertaining.
Das Spiel spricht für sich... ein absoluter Klassiker. Gebt uns Portal 3!

Tek bir oyun alabileceksen, bunu almanı öneririm.  Oyunun tek oyunculu hikaye modu olsun, çift oyunculu hikaye modu olsun her şeyi mükemmel. Defalarca bitirdiğim tek oyun. Hikayesi her oyunun hikayesine bin basar. İlk aldığım paralı oyun buydu ve iyi ki almışım.
很好玩，玩steam必买游戏之一
It is extremely fun and challenging
Não gostei, acho muito repetitivo o game, além de causar dor de cabeça/enjoo toda vez que jogo, os gráficos são inegavelmente bonitos, porém não recomendo mesmo, ainda bem que comprei por 3 reais.
dis cool i beat it in seven hours doe so i need a co-op partner
most modern games kinda suck but I just bought this game and its honestly still beautiful to this day.  Everything about it is great and it shows valve really cares about their games

Самая лучшая игра в которую я играл!
Да ещё и кооператив! Ммм балдёж:)
Сюжет неплохой, геймплей интересный, шутки смешные, музыкальное оформление и построение уровней тоже на высоте. Браво, Valve.

自通关传送门系列之后，基本不会再有玩游戏晕眩的情况了。

而且发现主角摔不死之后我就不恐高了_(:3」∠❀)_
小时候就想有个传送门，虽然这个没自己想象的那么牛叉，但也不错了，关卡思路很丰富，就是过关方式太单一了
OMGGGGGG BEST THING I LOVE THIS GAME AND SOME FAN MADE MERCH
